title: Nerf a champion and give a terrible reason to go along with it.
body:
{{champion:9}} - Fear now only works on {{champion:498}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:268}}( {{champion:3}} Birdio skin only)({{champion:133}} In R) and the raptor camp. Scare crows shouldn't be able to scare anything other than birds.

Edit- Wow Im on the Hot page :o
Edit 2- I didn't actually think this post would get far but it did and has some good ones
